about_the_game:
Red Matter 2 is an immersive, puzzle-adventure game that will transport you to the far reaches of space in a dystopian cold war setting. Step into the shoes of Sasha, an agent awakened in a lunar base by an undercover operative and tasked with uncovering the secrets of the mysterious Red Matter. As you journey through the solar system following a trail left behind by someone from Sasha's past, you'll be challenged with mind-bending puzzles, stealth and platforming mechanics, and even intense combat sections. Explore visually stunning Volgravian bases, and experience a spine-chilling atmosphere that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

About VR Gameplay:

Embark on a journey of discovery and adventure as you explore a fully interactive world designed to enhance the feeling of immersion in virtual reality. Solve environmental, physics, and logic puzzles with the help of your tools, and be awestruck by the beautiful, fully physicalized environments that surround you. Use your jetpack to soar through the skies and move without limits as you traverse platforming sections, and hack into terminals to uncover secrets and clear your path. But be prepared for the unexpected, as Volgravia has taken great measures to protect the secrets you seek. Expect thrilling combat and unexpected encounters as you uncover the mysteries of this fully-realized world. Red Matter 2 is the ultimate VR adventure, and a must-play for anyone looking for a thrilling, immersive experience.

About the PC version:



The PC version of the game features:
  • High-resolution textures
  • Highest polycount mesh is always visible. No mesh lodding.
  • Dynamic shadows
  • Indirect Shadows
  • Valve Index Controllers: If the game detects Valve Index Controllers being used, you will see a custom-made controller in-game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

reviews:
“With its intuitive control system, excellent object interaction, and some great UI design, this Cold War-themed sci-fi adventure is one of VR’s most polished games yet.”
8/10 – IGN

“Red Matter 2 is a gripping sci-fi experience that blends together satisfying puzzling and beautiful visuals into one mighty fun package. I was constantly in awe of the sights I saw in the game, the puzzles were head-scratching without being frustrating, whilst the narrative kept me intrigued right until the very end. It betters the standard set by the original game in almost every way, with the experience a more varied and meatier one overall.”
9/10 – Use A Potion!

“There have been some great VR games over the years but Red Matter 2 is, simply put, a must-have.”
9/10 – Press Play Media
